response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Should you choose to accept, you'll be securing not just a product but a valuable asset that will contribute to your success. Please let us know your decision soon so we can proceed with your order.", "product_price": 750000}
